    <metadata>

      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lom.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oai</catalog>
            <entry>oai:aspect.cup.cam.ac.uk:cahi1:data_11115742f0d0b8b64931984b8f6d417cf2869aa5</entry>

          <identifier>
            <catalog>CUP</catalog>
            <entry>cahi1:data_11115742f0d0b8b64931984b8f6d417cf2869aa5</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Reflection, transmission and absorption of electromagnetic waves</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Reflexion, Übertragung und Absorption der 
elektromagnetischen Wellen</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Réflexion, transmission et absorption des ondes 
électromagnétiques</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Reflexão, transmissão e absorption de ondas 
eletromagnéticas</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Riflessione, trasmissione ed assorbimento delle 
onde elettromagnetiche</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αντανάκλαση, μετάδοση και απορρόφηση των 
ηλεκτρομαγνητικών κυμάτων</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Reflexión, transmisión y absorción de ondas 
electromagnéticas</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This diagram shows that electromagnetic waves maybe reflected (top), transmitted (middle) or absorbed (bottom) when they hit a solid, liquid or gas.</string>
          </description>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">electromagnetic waves</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">gases</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">liquids</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">reflection</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">solids</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">transmission</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Dieses Diagramm zeigt, daß elektromagnetische 
Wellen sich möglicherweise (Oberseite) reflektierten, übertragen 
(Mitte) oder aufgesogen (Unterseite) als sie ein festes schlugen, 
Flüssigkeit oder Gas.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Ce diagramme prouve que les ondes 
électromagnétiques peut-être reflétées (dessus), transmises 
(milieu) ou absorbées (bas) quand elles frappent un plein, liquide ou
gaz.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Este diagrama mostra que as ondas 
eletromagnéticas refletiram talvez (alto), transmitido (meio) ou 
absorvido (fundo) quando bateram um contínuo, líquido ou gás.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questo schema indica che le onde elettromagnetiche
forse hanno riflesso (parte superiore), trasmesso (metà) o assorbito 
(parte inferiore) quando hanno colpito un solido, liquido o gas.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτό το διάγραμμα δείχνει ότι τα ηλεκτρομαγνητικά 
κύματα ίσως απεικόνισαν (κορυφή), διαβιβασθείσα (μέση) ή 
απορρόφησαν (κατώτατο σημείο) όταν χτύπησαν ένα στερεό, υγρό 
ή αέριο.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Este diagrama muestra que las ondas 
electromagnéticas reflejadas (tapa), transmitidas (centro) o 
absorbidas quizá (fondo) cuando golpean un sólido, líquido o gas.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">elektromagnetische Wellen</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Gase</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Flüssigkeiten</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Reflexion</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Körper</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Übertragung</string>
          </keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          <keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">transmissão</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
